abstract.p: China's effort to gain admission World Trade Organization encounters new problems, undercutting chances that country can join by end of year (S)

block.p: China's effort to gain admission to the World Trade Organization has encountered new problems, undercutting the chances that the country can join by the end of the year. China's top negotiator, Long Yongtu, denied speculation of a deadlock, but the W.T.O. negotiating group chairman issued a statement calling for a ''fundamental re-examination of negotiating positions in capitals'' before any new session takes place. Charlene Barshefsky, the United States trade representative, has asked for a meeting with China's premier, Zhu Rongji, but no date has been set, Mr. Long said.

Charlene Barshefsky, the United States trade representative, has asked for a meeting with China's premier, Zhu Rongji, but no date has been set, Mr. Long said.
